Location: Carlsbad, California OR Fully RemoteMust be legally authorized to work in the United States.About the Opportunity:We're hiring a Principal Engineer / Architect to help grow our system! We have teams working on Machine Learning, APIs, Data Pipelines, and search indexes, and we need the right architecture to help all the pieces fit together. You'll have the opportunity to have an outsized impact from the beginning, and to work with other members of the team to ensure the architecture is scalable and reliable.We're looking for a technical expert who can help mentor and build teams, provide empathetic leadership, and work with other leaders across the organization to solve tough real-world problems with cutting-edge technology.From your first day, you will make a valuable — and valued — contribution. We are a fast-growing company where no one is a bystander. We offer you the opportunity to delight millions of consumers around the world while gaining meaningful experience across a variety of disciplines.Duties And ResponsibilitiesProvide empathic leadership and mentorship across the organizationDrive technical decision making and help with roadmap planningCollaborate with our Product, QA, and business partners to develop creative solutionsScope and break down abstract ideas into actionable workCommunicate across the organization about Engineering initiatives and progressEvaluate and interview potential job candidates across the organizationOrganize and communicate large-scale technical work across teams and departments Skills and Qualifications: Graduate degree in Computer Science or a similar field, or equivalent work experience Expert knowledge of the following technologies:Java and/or .NET CoreKafka or equivalent messaging busElastic Search or similar search technologiesAPI DesignContainerization - Docker and Kubernetes preferredEvent driven architecturesMicroservices and distributed systemsCI/CDExperience communicating with both technical and non-technical groups about the architecture. Experience distilling functional and business requirements into actionable engineering workAbility to drive good standards and practices across the Engineering organizationThe US base salary range for this role is between $175,000 and $250,000 annualized plus bonus, equity value (where applicable) and benefits. Your base pay will depend on your experience, location, skills and qualifications.About the Company: Seekr is a search and information evaluation company that is dedicated to addressing the problems of disinformation and bias. We put the power of reliable media consumption in the hands of the people. Our search engine and information evaluation app and web destination use machine objectivity to score any type of search result so that people know the reliability of information before they click. Instead of relying on human analysis, we use scientific rigor and multiple machine learning algorithms to reduce misinformation and manipulation.Our environment is fast paced, requiring the ability to work autonomously, and hands on from day one, with minimal supervision in an ever-changing environment. You will need to demonstrate excellent problem-solving skills. The right mix of organizational and communication skills will be the key to success. Attention to detail and a proven ability to manage priorities are also essential. We are looking for people ready to lead by example, be selfless in your leadership across teams, collaborate with your peers, and partner with colleagues and external partners.Company Benefits:Working with a smart and talented team to solve the big misinformation problems in news we currently face Exciting and cutting-edge technologies at scale 100% remote position - work from where you like Highly competitive salary Company investment in training, certifications, and your professional development Company Bonus PlanEmployee Equity Program401k Retirement plan with matchingMedical, Dental and Vision Insurance for you and your familyLife Insurance / DisabilityUnlimited PTO13 Paid HolidaysEmployee Assistance Program
